name: AVCaptureDevice.PrimaryConstituentDeviceRestrictedSwitchingBehaviorConditions
desc: A structure that defines the conditions in which to restrict camera switching.

items.name: static var exposureModeChanged: AVCaptureDevice.PrimaryConstituentDeviceRestrictedSwitchingBehaviorConditions
items.desc: Restrict switching to a fallback camera only when the device’s exposure mode changes.

items.name: static var focusModeChanged: AVCaptureDevice.PrimaryConstituentDeviceRestrictedSwitchingBehaviorConditions
items.desc: Restrict switching to a fallback camera only when the device’s focus mode changes.

items.name: static var videoZoomChanged: AVCaptureDevice.PrimaryConstituentDeviceRestrictedSwitchingBehaviorConditions
items.desc: Restrict switching to a fallback camera only when the device’s video zoom changes.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt)
items.desc: Creates a switching behavior condition with an unsigned integer value.
